data.text: Last but not least, we can’t have a list of pink sights without the iconic La Maison Rose, the pink house. This lovely building not only looks great in pictures, but the restaurant inside serves some pretty amazing food. Book now on https://t.co/AeMNWOslh5! https://t.co/NvoM2zoUQV

data.text: @leomainie2 Hi, sorry to hear you've been waiting so long. Please give us a call on our assistance line (local rates) and our colleagues can help right away. Numbers are here: https://t.co/3TxHxhckDD. Another option is to send us an official claim here: https://t.co/F1LYZYRxMV

@Studio76HD Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.

@alyssas_acnh Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.
@catrionaeloise Hi. Yes, it's free of charge and goes in the hold.

data.text: @cathydonald Hi Cathy, If you need assistance please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre: https://t.co/4KXMx8pBhX.
@mavis_walter Hi Natasha, you can contact us to seat you together as a family. Have a safe flight!
@DanielT85085856 @WizzAirUK_W9 You need to contact us using Live Chat or Call Centre and we can assist you.
@DearGwait Hi Gwait, once changes are accepted we can not offer the other options. Have a nice day!

data.text: @MsSlemp Hi there, we apologize that you felt that WIZZ let you down on this occasion. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.

urls.title: Cabin Crew Recruitment Days
urls.description: Careers Home Page of Wizz Air

data.text: Our strength is in numbers – 2,500 new cabin members have joined the #WIZZCabinCrew just in 2022! Want to help us make it to 3,000 by becoming part of our ever-growing team? Apply now! 👉 https://t.co/vV6YOl7Agf https://t.co/pQzWHEtO0m

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Sports & Fitness Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to sports nutrition, athletic apparel, sports apps, fitness venues

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations
